@graph.caption: Gallina pinta soup in a melon colored bowl surrounded by lime, toasted bread

@graph.name: Gallina Pinta (Bean and Hominy Soup) « Dora's Table
@graph.description: Gallina Pinta is a beautiful stew of pinto beans, hominy, Anaheim Chile, and herbs. Served with limes, cilantro, onion, and Chile chiltepin.

@graph.name: Dora S.
@graph.description: Dora is the founder, recipe developer, and photographer at Dora's Table and Mi Mero Mole. Born and raised in Mexico and a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in New York, she adopted a vegan (plant-based) diet to take control of her health.

@graph.name: GALLINA PINTA
@graph.description: Gallina Pinta Soup, a thick stew of beans and hominy made in the Sonora style, an authentic Mexican recipe gone vegan
recipeIngredient: 1  Anaheim pepper, (stemmed and deseeded (increase quantity according to taste))
Salt to taste, (add at the end when the hominy has “burst”)
Chiltepin or chile piquín to taste
4 slices Bolillo bread, (toasted and slathered in vegan butter)

recipeInstructions.text: Clean the beans and soak them for 8 – 12 hours, discard the soaking water and rinse the beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Clean the beans and soak them for 8 – 12 hours, discard the soaking water and rinse the beans.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the hominy in a strainer and rinse until the water is clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the hominy in a strainer and rinse until the water is clear.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the beans, hominy, garlic, onion, Anaheim pepper, and coriander seeds in the slow-cooker. Add water (according to the instructions on your slow cooker). Cook on low for 12 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the beans, hominy, garlic, onion, Anaheim pepper, and coriander seeds in the slow-cooker. Add water (according to the instructions on your slow cooker). Cook on low for 12 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Check periodically and add more water if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Check periodically and add more water if necessary.

recipeInstructions.text: When the beans are cooked and the hominy has “burst”, remove the chile skins and add salt to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: When the beans are cooked and the hominy has “burst”, remove the chile skins and add salt to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot in large bowl. Place garnishes on the table so everyone can garnish their own plate.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot in large bowl. Place garnishes on the table so everyone can garnish their own plate.

@graph.keywords: gallina pinta, vegan mexican recipes, vegan soups
